# Glossary

| English                         | Tagalog                            |
|---------------------------------|------------------------------------|
| boots (rubber)                  | b**o**tas                          |
| blue                            | bugh**a**w/as**u**l                |
| brown                           | kaymanggi'/bra**u**n/tsokol**a**te |
| cold                            | malam**i**g                        |
| color                           | kulay                              |
| dark (brightness)               | madilim                            |
| dark/black (color)              | maitim                             |
| deep                            | mal**a**lim                        |
| farmer                          | magsasak**a**                      |
| flower                          | bulakl**a**k                       |
| foul-smelling                   | mab**a**ho'                        |
| fragrant                        | mabang**o**                        |
| gardener                        | hardin**e**ro                      |
| golden                          | kulay-ginto                        |
| green                           | lunti**a**n/b**e**rde              |
| grass                           | dam**o**                           |
| hat                             | sumbr**e**ro                       |
| hot                             | ma**i**nit                         |
| landowner/plantation owner      | asind**e**ro                       |
| light[^1]                       | liwanag                            |
| light (lamp)                    | **i**law                           |
| mango                           | mangg**a**                         |
| mountain                        | bund**o**k                         |
| plow                            | ar**a**ro                          |
| pump                            | b**o**mba                          |
| rain/rainy                      | ul**a**n/maul**a**n                |
| rice (plant/grain with husk)    | p**a**lay                          |
| rice (harvested, husk removed)  | bigas                              |
| rice husk                       | **i**pa                            |
| rice (cooked)                   | k**a**nin                          |
| rice (cold, leftover)           | bahaw                              |
| rice (toasted at bottom of pot) | tutong                             |
| rice (sticky)                   | mal**a**gkit                       |
| rice (fried)                    | sinang**a**g                       |
| rectangular                     | rekt**a**nggulo                    |
| round                           | bil**o**g                          |
| seashore (coast, beach)         | tabing-dagat                       |
| scythe/sickle                   | k**a**rit                          |
| shallow                         | mab**a**baw                        |
| sky                             | l**a**ngit                         |
| tree                            | p**u**no                           |
| water                           | tubig                              |
| wind/windy                      | h**a**ngin/mah**a**ngin            |
| yellow                          | dil**a**w                          |

[^1]: as in light from the sun.
